```{r}
devtools::load_all()
```
```{r}
mexp <- SLINGtools::MidarExperiment()
mexp <- SLINGtools::loadMasshunterCSV(mexp, "Test_MH.csv")
mexp <- SLINGtools::loadMSOrganizerXLM(mexp, "MSTemplate_Creator_forTest.xlsm")

mexp <- SLINGtools::normalizeByISTD(mexp)
mexp <- SLINGtools::quantitateByISTD(mexp)
mexp <- SLINGtools::calcQC(mexp)

```

```{r}
SLINGtools::writeReportXLS(data = mexp, filename = here(".testing/MyReport"))
```
